description:
This course is about Algebra. This course is for those in education, or those who need a refresher course.

In this course you will have access to different presentations that cover a wide range of math tips. In addition, self-study guides and worksheets will be provided to help you train towards becoming successful Algebra users. The course is set up to allow you to learn at your own pace with six sessions to help you learn. The course is structured so that you can select which presentations to view in any order you wish. This course is designed for you and is flexible for all learners to explore and to learn.

In addition, more focused courses on essay writing, English grammar, and study skills help are also available under the "Study Time: Your Academic Success Center" umbrella of training support.
title: Learn Algebra, from Beginner to Advanced equations
